page.para: Samir’s grandpa cannot read the newspaper. His glasses are broken!
Samir runs to get his box of things.
What does he find? Wow! A shining magnifying glass.
Everything looks bigger through a magnifying glass.
Now Samir’s grandpa can read the newspaper!
Samir’s uncle is in the kitchen. He cannot pour the cooking oil into the bottle.
What does Samir find this time?
Wow! A funnel with a big, wide mouth.
You can pour anything through a funnel.
Now Samir’s uncle can pour the oil.
Samir’s grandma cannot do her sewing.
She has dropped her needles on the floor.
What does Samir find this time? Wow! A magnet.
Anything iron will stick to it.
Now Samir’s grandma can do her sewing.
Samir’s box of things is great!
